# Introduction
```{r, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = TRUE, message = FALSE)
library("tidyverse")
```

This is a summary (or rather rephrased version) of the class computational
statistics at ETH Zurich, enriched with notes from the lecture, examples and R
code. The main source is the
[script](https://polybox.ethz.ch/index.php/s/q3NaRdR7K6Xrfkd/download) of the
course.
